channel.title: Scenarios on Promotion of Research data management, an open source Project.

item.title: working strategies
item.description: Modified from https://research-data-network.readme.io/docs/senior-management-engagement (reorganise text and add comments), This is the result of the analyse of discussion in the UK community, remember that country specificities in working strategies and stories are to be expected. Use senarios and story-telling Accusation of fraud We all agreed that one strategy that works for almost all possible audience types are doomsday scenarios â€“ disasters that can happen when researchers do not adhere to good RDM practice.
